articles.title: Apple is delaying the only Apple Intelligence feature everyone wanted
articles.author: Mac World
articles.summary: The new personalized Siri won't be available until at least the time iPhone 17 is on the shelves. The main features being delayed are onscreen awareness, personal context, and app intents. It's an embarrassing admission of how far behind Apple is on AI.

articles.title: Inside Christie's First AI Art Auction
articles.author: Nbsp
articles.summary: Christie's first artificial intelligence (AI) art auction concluded this week. 14 of the 34 lots received no qualifying bids or were sold for less than the minimum Christie's had estimated. An animation by well-known digital artist Refik Anadol fetched the highest price at $277,200. A work by the late American artist Charles Csuri went for $50,400. A separate group of artists had launched a petition urging Christie's to cancel the sale because some pieces were created with the help of AI models.

articles.title: Bucknell professors look at the pros and cons of AI
articles.author: GAWHARA ABOU-EID THE WEEKENDER
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) is reshaping the landscape of employment, education and the overall industry. Professors from Bucknell University have weighed in on how AI is changing the future of the industry and the education of the future workforce. They discuss its potential to revolutionize industries and challenges.

articles.title: Art more than just the click of a button
articles.author: SABRINA BARNER THE WEEKENDER
articles.summary: Pamela Madai is an artist based in Muncy. She received a degree in Fine Arts from St. Francis University, but she has been creating works of art since childhood. AI allows for the creation of art with the click of a button.

articles.title: Latest WhatsApp beta introduces yet another useless AI feature
articles.summary: Meta is starting to introduce AI features into WhatsApp. It's starting with image generation for profile icons and group chat icons, but it's likely to be extended to other chat topics and profile pictures in the future. Some people are not fond of AI in WhatsApp, but others are.

articles.title: AI-created church service in Finland was quirky and fun but lacked human warmth, worshippers say
articles.summary: It was the first church service in Finland put together mostly by artificial intelligence. AI tools wrote the sermons and some of the songs, composed the music and created the visuals, including a dialogue between a bearded Jesus and a menacing-looking Satan in modern clothes.

articles.title: WhatsApp just made its AI impossible to avoid – but at least you can turn it off
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: Meta embedded its Meta AI assistant into WhatsApp. WhatsApp expanded Meta AI from a floating action button to a search bar integration and then the in-chat tag that lets you add it to the group chat. Now, the tech giant is extending the strategy with a dedicated widget. The widget will give you access to its text search, camera for image-based queries and voice input for hands-free interactions.

articles.title: What I Really Think About the Largest Handheld Gaming PC on the Market
articles.author: Bryn Gelbart
articles.summary: MSI's Claw 8AI+ is the biggest, most powerful handheld gaming machine yet. It has an 8-inch FHD+ screen, higher res than 1080p, lower than 1440p. It's heavy, but ergonomically designed from a controls standpoint. It costs $100 off the original version.

articles.title: Your job, your future, your humanity: AI just crossed the line we can never undo
articles.author: Glenn Beck
articles.summary: Glenn has been warning people for 30 years about the dangers of artificial intelligence. He urges people to start using advanced AI tools and to learn how to control them. If they don't, they will be left behind and they'll be swallowed whole by AI.

articles.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Unveils AI-Powered MacBook Air with M4 Chip
articles.author: Ghazal Ahmed
articles.summary: Goldman Sachs has raised its 12-month target for MSCI Emerging Markets Index by 3%, reaching 1,220 from 1,190. Axelera AI has been awarded a grant of up to 61.6 million euros to develop a chip for use in data centers. Europe is increasingly trying to fund domestic chipmakers and build publicly funded data centers, known as "AI factories". Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has 166 Hedge Fund Holders.

articles.title: Govt-Industry Unite: Boost AI Safety, Spur Innovation
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Paulo Carvão is a senior fellow at the Harvard Kennedy School's Mossavar-Rahmani Center for Business and Government. He is a former IBM executive with decades of experience in digital transformation and AI. His team developed a model for AI governance that fosters innovation and offers protections against harms.

articles.title: Local colleges launch AI-focused degree programs
articles.author: Raymond Baccari
articles.summary: Rhode Island College offers a bachelor's degree in artificial intelligence. Bristol Community College is offering an associate's degree beginning this fall semester. Both colleges are joining a growing list of higher education institutions that offer degrees focused on AI. According to the National Science Foundation, there are 14 such programs throughout the country.

articles.title: AI-Powered Success: How DeckTrade is Helping Traders Maximize Profits
articles.summary: DeckTrade's AI-powered trading system analyzes market data, executes trades with precision and adjusts strategies based on real-time conditions. Traders have reported higher accuracy, better risk management, and increased profitability after integrating AI into their strategies using the DeckTrade system.

articles.title: How Long Will AI's Free-Trial Era Last?
articles.author: New York Magazine
articles.summary: Every big consumer tech cycle has its free-trial era. In 1999, in a few cities, it was the magic of at-cost same-day delivery from Kozmo, which lost money on every order. Free-to-access AI is very close to the frontier.

articles.title: China's Autonomous Agent, Manus, Changes Everything
articles.author: Craig S. Smith
articles.summary: Manus AI is the world's first fully autonomous AI agent capable of independent thought and action. It is a digital polymath trained to manage tasks across industries without the inefficiencies of human hesitation. The release of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI model designed to rival OpenAI's GPT-4, was described as China's Sputnik moment for AI.

articles.title: Hit Reboot: The Mindset To Unlock AI's Potential
articles.author: Margie Warrell
articles.summary: The rapid rise of generative AI has left many leaders unsure about how to keep up with it and lead with confidence. McKinsey Global Survey found that 87% of senior executives recognize digital transformation as a priority, but only 10% believe their organizations are effectively implementing it. Valtech study found that 94% of leaders experience tech anxiety, with their biggest concerns centering around: 'tech anxiety'

articles.title: Apple says some AI improvements to Siri delayed to 2026
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Some improvements to Apple's voice assistant Siri will be delayed until 2026. Apple has been working on a more personalized Siri, giving it more awareness of your personal context and also personalizing it based on that context.   iReport.com: What do you think about Siri's improvements?

articles.title: Despite the STEM gender gap, most of the researchers at this B.C. AI lab are women
articles.author: CBC
articles.summary: 75 per cent of researchers at Simon Fraser University's artificial intelligence lab are women. In Canada, women make up less than one-quarter of the people employed in STEM careers, but they make up 75 per cent at the university's AI lab, which is a first for Canada.

articles.title: Athena moon lander ended up on its side, bringing mission to an early end
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: Intuitive Machines says its Athena lunar lander was launched on January 31, 2016.       i.e. it was launched by Intuitive Machines' Athena Lunar Lander, which is operated by Intelligrated Machines' subsidiary, Intuitive Machine.

articles.title: Xinhua Headlines: AI in spotlight at China's "two sessions"
articles.author: China.dot.org
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) has become a buzzword at China's ongoing "two sessions" as observers watch how it will fit into the nation's rejuvenation drive. High costs and huge investments used to limit AI accessibility, according to Xinhua. DeepSeek is a Chinese tech startup.

articles.title: Explosive Surge: US AI Bills in 2025 Already Shatter All of 2024 Records
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: The world of artificial intelligence is evolving in code and algorithms as well as in the halls of US lawmakers. The legislative landscape around AI is already exploding. The sheer number of developments in the field makes it seem like 2024 will be the busiest year for AI developments.

articles.title: Guest Opinion: Those who say AI will never match human creativity are wrong
articles.author: The Keene Sentinel
articles.summary: Most academic writers acknowledge that artificial intelligence is beginning to encroach on their field, including the ability to write a cogent essay demonstrating critical thought as well as the need to be able to write an essay with cogent argumentation.   .

articles.title: Professor Daniela Rus: A New Voice In The Vinfuture Prize Council Honoring AI And Robotics Revolution
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence and robotics are reshaping industries and societies in the near future. Vietnam is one of the countries that will be affected by the development of AI and robotics in the next few decades. Vietnam will be a major player in this field by the 2030s.

articles.title: Microsoft reportedly developing AI reasoning models
articles.author: GCC Business News
articles.summary: Microsoft is reportedly working on creating its own artificial intelligence (AI) reasoning models to rival OpenAI and may offer them for sale to developers. The company has begun testing models from xAI, Meta, and DeepSeek as potential OpenAI replacements in Copilot.

articles.title: How GTA 6's new AI could make NPCs smarter than ever
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Grand Theft Auto VI (GTA 6) promises to revolutionize gameplay by using state-of-the-art artificial intelligence to better bring non-playable characters (NPCs) to life. This technological advance has the goal of achieving a richer, more interactive environment in the game.

articles.title: Threatening AI Agents: Signal President Exposes Profound AI Privacy Risks
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Signal President Meredith Whittaker has warned about the dangers of agentic AI and its potential privacy and security implications. She made the remarks at SXSW this week. Whittakers describes the burgeoning field of AI agents as potentially potentially dangerous and potentially convenient.

articles.title: Conference Explores AI's Potential in Fraud Detection
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: The 8th Anti-Fraud National Conference will be held in Omolabake Fasogbon. The conference will focus on Artificial Intelligence (AI) driven fraud and data analytics. It will cover topics such as Forensic Fraud Investigation, Internal Auditing and Enterprise Risk Management.

articles.title: Researchers in Israel discover key protein in turning cancer aggressive
articles.author: Famagusta Gazette
articles.summary: Researchers from Israel's Weizmann Institute of Science have identified a key factor in the development of aggressive melanoma tumors. The study was published in Cancer Discovery this week. It explored the factors that drive a cancerous tumor to become aggressive and found a link between these factors and the cancer's aggressiveness.

articles.title: Afghan Women Turn To AI Companions Amid Taliban's Harsh Restrictions
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Lima, an 18-year-old from rural Afghanistan treats AI as a friend to help her get through the days. She is grateful to AI for helping her get by in her daily life.    iReport.com will let you know how AI helps you.

articles.title: How overcharged patients are enlisting AI to fight against high medical bills: ‘This is theft'
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Alicia Bittle gave birth to her son in August, but she rushed him to the emergency room just three weeks later after he developed a fever. She believes hospitals charge arbitrary amounts so that when you get your co-pay amount from your insurance, you're relieved you don't have to pay $14,000.

articles.title: Google leans more into AI-generated overviews
articles.author: Independent Record
articles.summary: Google is updating its search engine with the next generation of its artificial intelligence technology as part of an effort to provide instant expertise amid intensifying competition from smaller competitors.      Â   in Google's search engine is being updated with the Next Generation of its Artificial Intelligence Technology.

articles.title: US to use AI to track, revoke visas of international students supporting Hamas
articles.author: The Siasat Daily
articles.summary: The United States Department announced a plan to introduce online artificial intelligence (AI) systems to detect international students backing Palestine-based resistance outfit Hamas and revoke their visas. The comprehensive approach will be carried out in collaboration with the Departments of Justice and Homeland Security and will be implemented in the near future.

articles.title: Can Scotland keep up with competition in AI race?
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: Layering AI into your product could be one way to ensure you're not left behind by AI technology. It's a way to make sure you don't get left behind. It could be a good way to avoid losing out to AI technology in the future.

articles.title: Fox News AI Newsletter: Helping DOGE cut waste
articles.author: Fox News
articles.summary: Welcome to Fox News' Artificial Intelligence newsletter with the latest AI technology advancements. In today's newsletter, Fox News looks at how AI can help Trump and DOGE cut costs.    iReport.com will send you a link to it in today's edition.

articles.title: AI-generated ‘doctors' are duping TikTok users with fake medical advice — here's how to spot ...
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Deepfake doctors are scamming social media users with unfounded medical advice. On TikTok, one search yields dozens of videos of women rattling off phrases like, '13 years as a coochie doctor and nobody believes me when I tell them this'

articles.title: McDonaldâs bets BIG on AI to revolutionize fast food experience across 43,000 locations
articles.author: Natural News
articles.summary: In a bold move to modernize its operations, McDonald's is rolling out artificial intelligence (AI) across all 43,000 of its global restaurants. The move is aimed at modernizing the company's operations and improving customer service.

articles.title: AI drone transforms road maintenance, wins recognition
articles.author: Oman Observer
articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming public services worldwide, enhancing efficiency, sustainability and quality of life. As cities face growing infrastructure problems, Muscat believes AI will help improve public services in the long-term.      .

articles.title: AI speeds up titanium alloy production with higher strength for submarine manufacturing
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Johns Hopkins research team is using AI to enhance titanium alloys for applications from deep-sea exploration to space travel. Manufacturing high-performance titanium alloy parts for spacecraft, submarines, and medical devices has traditionally been a slow, resource-intensive process.

articles.title: AI bubble is bursting: top AI stocks to sell to avoid long-term losses
articles.author: Invezz
articles.summary: The artificial intelligence (AI) industry has propelled the US equities market in the past few years. NVIDIA's market cap jumped to over $3 trillion. Recently, there are signs that the AI bubble is bursting, which will affect some of the top companies.

articles.title: Signal president warns the hyped agentic AI bots threaten user privacy
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Meredith Whittaker, the president of Signal, discussed the risks of agentic AI at SXSW in Austin. Agentic AI refers to bots that can reason and perform tasks for humans without their input. It is giving too much control to systems that are going to need access to data.

articles.title: CIA Kryptos sculptor disgusted by flood of wrong AI solutions
articles.author: Boing Boing
articles.summary: For 35 years, a cryptic sculpture at CIA headquarters has stumped the world's top code breakers. Now, AI chatbots are generating a flood of wrong answers from overconfident amateurs, much to the chagrin of the codebreakers.

articles.title: 3 AI Altcoins That Could 30X As China's ‘Manus' AI Shocks The World
articles.author: Coin Gape
articles.summary: The AI altcoins sector is expanding as artificial intelligence reshapes industries. Projects integrating AI coins could see 30X growth. These tokens enhance automation, security, and smart contracts. As AI technology advances, AI alt coins are positioned for broader adoption. The market for AI coins is expanding.
